vAPI - Exchange rate API¶

Quick reference¶

Resource

Operation

Description

  1. VCB

GET /api/exchange_rate/vcb

Get all VCB exchange rate

POST /api/exchange_rate/vcb

Post new exchange rate

Usage permission¶

To use this API, please request api_key via contact@vnappmob.com

Details¶

GET /api/exchange_rate/vcb¶

This function allows users to get the latest VCB exchange rate

Request:

GET /api/exchange_rate/vcb HTTP/1.1
Host: https://vapi.vnappmob.com
Accept: application/json

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "results": [
        {
            "currency": "EUR",
            "buy_cash": 25416.27,
            "buy_transfer": 25492.75,
            "sell": 26258.39
        },
        {
            "currency": "USD",
            "buy_cash": 23130.00,
            "buy_transfer": 23130.00,
            "sell": 23250.00
        }
    ]
}
Query Parameters

  • api_key – API Key generated by VNAppMob

Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – results

POST /api/exchange_rate/vcb¶

Limited function that allows data manager to push newest price

Request:

POST /api/exchange_rate/vcb HTTP/1.1
Host: https://vapi.vnappmob.com
Accept: application/json

Response:

HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Vary: Accept
Request Headers

  • Authorization – API Key generated by VNAppMob

  • Content-Type – application/json

Request JSON Object

  • post_datas (List[json]) – List of json data with below params

  • currency (string) – currency code (3 chars: VND, USD…)

  • buy_cash (float) – buy_cash

  • buy_transfer (float) – buy_transfer

  • sell (float) – sell

Status Codes

  • 201 Created – Successful update data

  • 403 Forbidden – Invalid api_key

  • 400 Bad Request – Error
